name: Fox Game!
description:
This is an unfinished game for the Wowie jam 3.0.

I didn't manage to complete it, but maybe I'll finish it later.

Arrow keys to move, get to the spike and avoid the stars.

The story is that you are a fox making a platformer and you have collected all the other assets you need, but you need more spikes! I guess this fits the theme because usually spikes are death and you want less, and stars are points and you want more.

Also, you can hook your head onto things because the hitbox is a T shape.

All art and code by me, made in scratch 3.0.
